content: perfect for all your travels around the world this hat features classic cable details and an extra long brim for a slouchy or fitted look features * both written and charted instructions * sizes for both children and adults * photo tutorial for c3f stitch materials needed * one skein lion brand fisherman s wool 100% wool 465 yds / 425 meters per 227 grams * one size us 8 / 5 0 mm circular needle * one size us 10 / 6 0 mm circular needle * one set size us 10 / 6 0 mm dpns * cabling needle * darning needle gauge 9 sts x 13 row = 2 in stockinette sizes child adult = 14 16 circumference
